Enums/SwapperError.html#/s:7Swapper0A5Er.name: viewToSwapToDoesNotExist(viewIndicator:)
Enums/SwapperError.html#/s:7Swapper0A5Er.abstract: The view you would like to swap to does not exist.

Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.name: transitionAnimationDuration
Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.abstract: The animation duration for swapping from an old view to the new view.

Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.name: updateAutoLayoutConstraints
Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.abstract: Automatically update the AutoLayout constraints of the children UIViews added to SwapperView. SwapperView will set the size of the UIView to the same bounds that the SwapperView is set for so all of the children UIViews are the same size as the SwapperView.

Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.name: swapToAnimateOldView
Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.abstract: Override the animation for old view that is getting swapped out.

Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.name: swapToAnimateNewView
Classes/SwapperViewConfig.html#/s:7Swapp.abstract: Override the animation for new view that is getting swapped in.

Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.name: defaultConfig
Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.abstract: Access to SwapperViewConfig to set defaults on all instances of SwapperView.

Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.name: setSwappingViews(_:)
Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.abstract: Remove all of the previous swapping views and set new ones. The first view in the list will be shown after this function called.

Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.name: currentView
Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.abstract: Reference the currently shown view, if it’s set.

Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.name: swappingViews
Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.abstract: All of the views that have been added to this SwapperView.

Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.name: swapTo(_:onComplete:)
Classes/SwapperView.html#/s:7Swapper0A4V.abstract: Remove the old view that was shown before and show the new view to the screen.

Classes/SwapperView.html.name: SwapperView
Classes/SwapperView.html.abstract: View that is able to swap between 1+ child views.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
